Reviews.Title: Buy it Buy Buy It .Great Great design, great performance
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo "Gaetan Junior"
Reviews.Content: I' so lucky and privileged to be the first to do the review of the piece of art at Amazon; I hold my heart before buying because there was no review about the great and lovely Notebook, but now I very very happy I made the move and bought this laptop.the design is great; it has the keyboard feel the same as the keyboard of the macbook pro and it has the design of the Hp spectre xt ultrabook. Most of you may not understand what I'm saying about the design if you have not touch the Hp spectre xt yet( it's a world design class,you will fell in love with if you ever have it)'Ok guy let go back to the HP ENVY 17----------- great performance,great avery battery life compare to traditional pc with cyberlink- blu ray  for video.Doesn't make noise. All I'm trying to say it that this is the great computer you can find on the market and has no regret for years to come. Only the new technology and innovations can make me replace this piece of art. Thanks to Hp

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Kris A Trierweiler
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time and packaged well.  Computer has been working great - doing exactly as expected.  Laptop has the space and power needed to push the envelope without needing to upgrade a thing.

Reviews.Title: HP doesn't honor their warranty on computers.
Reviews.Author: John P. Hoven
Reviews.Content: HP doesn't honor their warranty on computers.  I have an HP Envy dv7.  After it actually began smoking and then powered off (and has not powered on again), it took 5 HP support staff and 3 days of conversations before they agreed that it was even broken.  It has now been over 3 weeks when they told me they would have my laptop back to me in 5 business days, and now they are saying it will be at least 4 more weeks until they can return the laptop.  Dell and newegg have very good return policies and support services go to [...] or [...] if you are looking for a laptop.
